Description:
Family Charm in a Convenient location
Taking designer elegance to soaring new heights, this magnificent home invites an extraordinary lifestyle in the much-acclaimed central Epping, with an emphasis on multiple zoned living and a seamless flow of outdoor / indoor spaces.
A quiet location is complemented by an array of infrastructure including parkland, transport, a wide range of schools and plenty of shopping options including Pacific Epping and Westfield.
The home offers plenty of space with formal lounge, four generous bedrooms, the master serviced by a walk-in robe and full ensuite, a large light filled kitchen overlooking the dining and living area and the outdoor undercover entertaining space, providing the perfect setting to host family and friends.
Extras include heating, cooling, plenty of storage space, downlights to living areas, double garage with internal/drive through access, garden shed, landscaped gardens, S/S appliances, alarm and more.
All this on a generous 524m2 (approx.) block with low maintaince gardens.
Inspect with confidence and inspect today!

Description:
Irresistible Opportunity In An Impressive Location
Nestled on a generous allotment this absolutely immaculate, one owner home introduces spacious proportions for today and wonderful potential to undertake a contemporary update when time and budget allow.
Glossy solid timber floors, decorative cornice and unmarked paintwork enhance a traditional "L" shaped lounge dining, three bedrooms all with built in robes served by a pristine bathroom, formal lounge dining and a perfectly presented kitchen overlooking a family living zone. Sliding doors allow for easy access to a covered alfresco zone in a private rear yard introducing yet another entertainment area and a shed complementing the carport.
Just a few minute's drive or bus trip from the station, a location an easy walk to the bus, Greenbrook Village, primary and secondary schools and the Epping station introduces a highly desirable lifestyle opportunity in an exceptional discovery for first-home buyers.

SLICE OF HEAVEN
This amazing town home is scheduled for completion in the next few months. Be the first to move in & enjoy all that it offers: 3 spacious bedrooms, study, open bright kitchen / meals, stone benches, 2 bathrooms, private parking for 2 cars, internal access from garage & more. Approx 20.5sqs of quality & space. Close to all amenities in the Lyndarum Estate, opposite parklands, walk to shops & schools. A new street, a new home, for your new lifestyle. Don't delay call today.

Description:
Comfort lifestyle!
A perfect starter, investment or downsizing option is this warm and inviting home set in a quiet Epping location. This beautifully presented three-bedroom home offers complete minimal maintenance living with outstanding convenience in the palm of your hand. With a perfect place to start your family this is the ideal opportunity to get into the Norths booming market!
With convenient access to the Northern Hospital, Epping Plaza, Epping train station, local schools and local bus services makes this perfect to raise your family.
Aurora Village Coles, & Aldi are within walking distance.
Offering 3 bedrooms with built in robes (master with full ensuite and walk in robe),study nook conveniently positioned in the hall way, generous sized living area, a well-appointed modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, an open plan living/meals area with sliding doors opening to very low maintenance backyard and an undercover entertaining area complete with synthetic grass all around.
Complete with loads of natural light, ducted heating, cooling, alarm system and remote garage which can be used as office space or potential salon.
Inspect now!

Description:
Comfort Without Compromise
A fantastic location surrounded by all the elements that make the Hayston Valley Estate address one of such exceptional convenience, and complements the inherent family attraction of this home.
- The cul-de-sac position is serene yet perfectly central
- Inviting hallway reveals study and fabulous media room
- Living/dining domain finished with modern comfort in mind.
- Alfresco patio to a garden that bathes in northerly light
- Open space for play framed by productive vegetable garden
- Luxuriously large private ensuite to master bedroom
- Three further bedrooms each with built-in-robes
- Alluring upstairs retreat, two family bathrooms
- Double garage, alarm security, heating and cooling
- Schools and Epping Plaza are within minutes' reach

Description:
Blue Stone Views Hidden Gem
Situated in the heart of the Estate, this single owner property encapsulates the Epping lifestyle. Well maintained and loved throughout the years, a vision to maximize its true potential.
Upon entering you are graced with porcelain tiles and a modern colour scheme lining the way through the property bringing that grand appeal. Home to 4 bedrooms all with built in robes including the huge master with loads of space and en suite. The kitchen is a chefs delights with 40mm stone benches including island bench breakfast bar and 900mm stainless steel cooktop & canopy, it'll sure be a breeze catering for the masses with easy access through the French doors that open out into the alfresco area perfect to entertain all year round
With an easy flowing open plan living and functionality that will suit larger and extended family living due to the multiple living areas this property has to offer is best suited for the avid entertainer, whether it's for the friends and family, functions or general day to day to day life this will sure get the boxes ticked.
Extras include LED downlights, evaporative cooling & ducted heating, alarm, incoming NBN connection woodfire heater, low maintenance front gardens, large handyman shed, double garage with rear roller door access and gated laneway access ideal for parking the caravan, trailer or boat.
With absolutely nothing to spend, pack your bags because this is for you.
Inspections will delight!

Description:
Inviting Opportunity In A Perfect Position
Whether you're entering the market or looking to make an intelligent addition to your property portfolio, this three bedroom, two bathroom family home is set to secure astute buyers a successful future!
An enviable opening with sought after extras of engineered timber floors, multiple split system units, ducted heating and double garage secure behind a gated driveway, it is just moments from parklands, schools and the bus, a short drive to the Plaza and an easy walk to the station!
Formal living, large kitchen with plenty of storage and preparation space overlooked by the family meals, an enclosed veranda (second living room), and a large covered alfresco area deliver generous relaxed spaces for living and entertaining.
With scope to add value with your own contemporary touches over time, this is a very appealing opportunity indeed!

Description:
The Lifestyle youâve been waiting for
The moment you walk inside you will immediately feel the warmth of a great family home. Perfectly located and within walking distance to the new Aurora town centre, Harvest Home Primary and public transport this immaculately presented residence is perfect for the growing family, first home buyer or savvy investor. Positioned in the forever popular Aurora estate, this stunning home on a 478 sqm block comprises of four great sized bedrooms, three with BIR and serviced by a bright central bathroom and the master with walk in robe and full ensuite. With an abundance of space to relax and entertain enjoy two spacious living zones including rumpus and an open plan family/meals area flooded with natural light. The central hub of the home consists of a stunning kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, Caesarstone bench tops, tiled splash back and walk in pantry. With seamless transition from inside to out enjoy a great size back yard with a decked BBQ area perfect for entertaining friends and family all year round. Extras include, floating timber floors, high ceilings, laundry with external access, ducted heating, air-conditioning, double remote garage, alarm system, CCTV and quality window furnishings. Inspection is a must for this great home; the opportunity is yours, donât miss out.

Description:
A FAMILY LIFESTYLE THAT TICKS ALL THE BOXES
Positioned perfectly in the popular Aurora Estate of Epping within walking distance to schools, shops and parklands, with easy access to public transport, this home has everything to offer with relaxed cafÃ© dining and specialty stores at your doorstep. Adjacent to the newly built Aurora town centre, this standout property is also within close proximity to the Pacific Epping Shopping Centre & freeway. Step into this fantastic home offering 3 generous sized bedrooms including Master bedroom with walk in robe & full ensuite, with remaining bedrooms including walk in robes. The light filled central bathroom contains double vanities and stone benchtops. The striking polished Jarrah floorboards in the formal lounge lead you into the bright, spacious & stylish kitchen with stone benchtops , ample cupboard space and stainless steel appliances. With high cathedral ceilings that allow plenty of light and compliment the open plan living overlook the outdoor entertaining area with timber decking. Manicured gardens and a generous rear yard has plenty of room for the family to enjoy all year round. Added features Evaporative Cooling, Ducted Heating, lock up garage with internal access

Description:
Quality Built Family Home on 600sqm (approx) of Prime Land in Superb Location
This immaculately presented well-built family home will win your heart the moment you step in offering contemporary elegance and commanding street presence in a prime location. Perfect for entertaining family and friends for years to come with substance and style, this much family home has everything you need. An impressive entrance leads to a generous size formal living, spacious master suite with walk in robes and other three additional bedrooms with built in robes, spacious central bathroom, quality kitchen with upmarket stainless steel appliances overlooking dining and family area, leading to spacious entertainment area and a low maintenance backyard with plenty of space for kids or pets to run around.
Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and remote operated extra- large double garage with drive through access, plenty of storage space, rain water tank etc. Offering an exclusive lifestyle without compromise and within close proximity to schools, walking distance to Epping north shopping, Epping plaza, Epping train station, buses, local health & recreational facilities, parklands, and easy access to the Ring Rd network. Be sure to inspect!

Description:
Large Home, Immaculate Inside & Out!
A great opportunity presents itself here to secure a large 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, double garage home on a low maintenance allotment boasting street frontage and no Owner's Corporation fees!
This quality home boasts big living areas, huge master bedroom & walk in robe with ensuite, central heating, split system cooling, downlights, gas boosted solar hot water and double garage with rear roller door proving access to private rear yard.
Centrally located in the heart of Epping and close to all amenities - inspection will not disappoint.

Affordable Living in Central Location!
The perfect property for first home buyers looking to make an entrance into the market place or that lucrative investment that's just a rare treat to find! A sub-divided lot with NO Boday Corp fees, located in the heart of Epping Central, the location ideal to enjoy a lifestyle that offers walking distance to parklands, schools, shops and public transport this property will be a must inspect! With three large bedrooms and an opportunity to add your own unique style to the original fittings and fixtures in the kitchen and bathroom, with an open living area and courtyard with double garage, split system heating and cooling, gas log fire place and timber floors, this is one not to miss.

Description:
Fabulous Family Home Opposite Lyndarum Parklands!
This immaculately kept and much loved family home is in the sought after Lyndarum Estate. Perfectly positioned on a premier street opposite parklands and only a stones throw from Epping Views Primary School and the Lyndarum Town Centre this home boasts 3 bedrooms, master with ensuite & WIR's with fitted cabinetry. The open plan kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher flows on to a light filled living and dining area overlooking the under roofline alfresco area with merbau decking. Add to this 2.7metre high ceilings, full height doors, quality window furnishings, exposed aggregate paved driveway and paths, alarm system, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a meticulous low maintenance landscaped garden oasis. Must be sold.
Inspection will impress!
Auction May 12 @ 11.00AM
